room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: My 2 friends and I escaped the Asylum today and had a blast! This was my first escape room experience and I highly recommend it. I will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: This whole experience was fantastic! Customer service was great from the moment I called to book, the staff were friendly, fun, and passionate about visitors having a great experience. We did the Asylum and it was great! Thank you so much for making my first escape room awesome!

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Dare 2 Escape in Orlando
review: Second time here. Having done the Ringmaster room with just my husband, we brought some friends to try The Asylum. The theming was great! There were a great variety of puzzles so it didn't feel all like just trying to open some locks. We escaped but it was close. We had a great time and will probably be back to tackle The Dig.
